HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: More hauling opportunities By default prefers the proximity requirements set by vanilla, but loosens them to find valid haulables. Adjustable for optimal performance. Optimize hauling to construction If and only if hauling a resource to storage would bring it closer to a blueprint, do that first. Haul jobs carry more materials, and with Pick Up And Haul, many more. Support for Mehni's Pick Up And Haul!

Skip when bleeding Don't take jobs of opportunity when bleeding. Updated Optimize hauling to construction Now works as expected: instead of denying the inefficient supply job so some hauler eventually hauls, the builder themselves will.

Hauls are substantially improved on the default "recommended" setting. No longer should distant wood cut or metal mined be neglected.
(I've integrated the very last vanilla pathing check into this mod's magic.) Setting tooltips updated with detailed descriptions.

Haul to inventory support Advanced support for Mehni's Pick Up And Haul! Only items qualifying as opportunistic will be hauled; solves issue with spread-out stockpiles and unloading madness. (Dedicated haul jobs behave as normal, gathering as much as they can.)
